executiveSummary: Two Venezuelan sisters, MAF and Coko, presented their company Toast-It on Shark Tank, seeking $100,000 for 5% equity to expand their frozen Latin American food brand in the U.S. After discussions about margins, sales, and product quality, Daniel Lubetzky offered $150,000 for 20%, which the entrepreneurs accepted.
keyDecisions: Daniel Lubetzky invested $150,000 for 20% equity in Toast-It.

actionItems.task: Implement cost reduction initiatives including new packaging and production optimization to improve margins.
Collaborate with Daniel Lubetzky on strategic growth and distribution plans.

nextSteps: Toast-It will begin working with Daniel Lubetzky to improve profit margins, optimize operations, and expand distribution across major U.S. retailers.
